TopicTitle: Can't switch ships in map view - a clue

Articles.Content:
As I was playing KSP today and yesterday, I encountered the "can't switch ships in map view" multiple times. You know, that moment when you click a ship in map view and the menu allowing you to either target it or switch to it does not appear. This time, I got a menu belonging to a different object. I am 100% sure I was clicking on the ship. Yet when I chose to view it, the tracking station highlighted the asteroid, the one closest to both Kerbin and the ship.

So I thought I'll post it and maybe it will help something.
